title: Stylish Central Padang Stay with Pool, Onsite Dining, Bar & Spa
description:
Get the best of hospitality and world-class facilities under one roof at this contemporary hotel in the heart of West Sumatra. Explore the region's rich cultural heritage with popular attractions within short distances from you. Discover the grandeur of the nearby Adityawarman Museum, showcasing the province's unique Minangkabau architecture, or sample the local cuisine at the bustling Padang Food Street.

After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel and laze in your chic room with sweeping views of the bustling city. Refresh yourself with a swim in the shimmering pool or enjoy a drink or two at the Pool Bar. Head to the spa for some rejuvenation and a relaxing massage (a must in Indonesia), or savour an eclectic mix of flavours at the onsite Atlantis Restaurant. Plus, you can also enjoy live music at the Pool Bar every night!
offer_address: Jl. Purus IV No.8, Purus, Padang, West Sumatra, 25115, Indonesia
